Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அளவறிந்து வாழாதான் வாழ்க்கை உளபோல இல்லாகித் தோன்றாக் கெடும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The prosperity of him who lives without knowing the measure (of his property), will perish, even while it seems to continue.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A lavishly dressed person ('அளவறிந்து வாழாதான்') is shown living in a magnificent mansion. Everything appears prosperous and real ('உளபோல').
Layered_Composition.Midground: However, the mansion and all the wealth within it are depicted as a beautiful but fragile illusion, like a mirage or a hologram, that is beginning to flicker and fade.
Layered_Composition.Background: Through the fading illusion, the true reality is revealed: a barren wasteland and a ruined hovel. The prosperity is not real and is in the process of disappearing completely ('இல்லாகித் தோன்றாக் கெடும்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The life of one who lives beyond their means is an illusion of prosperity that will ultimately vanish and reveal a reality of ruin.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The wealth as a flickering mirage or hologram is the central metaphor. The contrast between the illusory mansion and the real ruin behind it is key.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The illusion is brightly colored but has a translucent, unstable quality. The true reality behind it is grey, desaturated, and bleak. The flickering light adds to the sense of instability.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A slow pull-back shot that starts with the illusion of wealth and gradually reveals its insubstantial nature and the ruin behind it.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, cinematic, with high-quality visual effects for the mirage/hologram.

Cultural_Anchors: Not living within one's means ('அளவறிந்து வாழாதான்')
Appearing to exist, but becoming nothing ('உளபோல இல்லாகி')

Negative_Prompt: solid mansion, happy person, real wealth, text artifacts, cartoonish.
